member.name: T:SqlInfo
member.summary: The class SqlInfo interprets return info from the server into update, insert, and delete counts.

member.name: P:StatementType
member.summary: Gets a value that represents the Statement Type.

member.name: P:InsertCount
member.summary: Gets a value that represents the number of records inserted.

member.name: P:UpdateCount
member.summary: Gets a value that represents the number of records updated.

member.name: P:DeleteCount
member.summary: Gets a value that represents the number of records deleted.

member.name: P:SelectCount
member.summary: Gets a value that represents the number of records selected. (??)

member.name: M:#ctor(System.Array,FirebirdSql.Data.INGDS.IGDS)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SqlInfo class.
